idea:
We began as a quartet of 20-somethings, headed with one objective, to help our fellow mates land an internship. One year since, and we are a team of 12, with an extended family of thousands of students and companies using our services. Our fondest memory is that of the earliest calls we received from students who were ecstatic about landing an internship via our portal. Thatâ€™s when we knew that what we began was actually serving a purpose. And we are not stopping any time soon.


So whether you are a confused student or an employer on a hunt for your dream team of interns, we have your requirements covered. Welcome to Intern Theory.
name: Intern Theory Career Solutions LLP

idea: Petmate is a new initiative in the world of pets building a community for pets. Petmate is India's first petworking app and has been gaining huge traction from various pet parents and pet service providers across the country. Petmate helps users share knowledge in the pet feed section, it helps find a playdate or play mate for thier pets, it helps in adoption of pets, it helps NGO/Shelter house to ensure safe homes for thier pets, it acts as a single platform for finding the various kinds of pet service providers. Petmate has already crossed 25000+ downloads on the Android playstore and expected to cross 100000 by august 2020. Petmate has a social network community on insta and facebook of more than 20000 already and gaining huge traction. We have already established a service provider network of more than 600 petcare providers across Mumbai / Delhi/NCR/Pune/Bangalore/Gujarat. We will have the network ready in chandigarh/chennai and kolkatta by end of march 2020.
name: PETZILLA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
RevEl is a product cum service-based B2B company, currently in the prototype phase.

We are solving one of the hazardous problems faced by industries using boilers i.e. SO2 emission into the atmosphere by making their boilers eco-friendly and ensuring a continuous supply of biomass.
name: RevEl
